code: @Test public void testSendInOnlyWithReplyTo() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:foo").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:bar").expectedMessageCount(0).     getMockEndpoint("mock:done").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     CamelContext camelContext = super.createCamelContext().     ConnectionFactory connectionFactory = CamelJmsTestHelper.createConnectionFactory().     camelContext.addComponent("activemq", jmsComponentAutoAcknowledge(connectionFactory)).     return camelContext. }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").to("activemq:queue:foo?replyTo=queue:bar&disableReplyTo=true").to("mock:done").             from("activemq:queue:foo").to("mock:foo").transform(body().prepend("Bye ")).             from("activemq:queue:bar").to("mock:bar").         }     }. }
